fieldUpdates.formula: IF( NOT(ISNULL( Parent_Question__c )) ,Survey_Version__r.CS_Survey_Version_Key__c &'_'& TEXT( Parent_Question__r.Question_Number__c ) &'_'& TEXT( Question_Number__c ) &'_'& TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( HOUR( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MINUTE( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( SECOND( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) ,Survey_Version__r.CS_Survey_Version_Key__c &'_'& TEXT( Question_Number__c ) &'_'& TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( HOUR( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( MINUTE( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) & TEXT( SECOND( TIMEVALUE( NOW() ) ) ) )
